Articles.Content:
Operation Minmus: Colonize Minmus

We succeeded after many launches, I decided to take the complicated route of sending all the ships and stuff seperate, Only thing left is to install kethane and send up some drills.

So we landed on minmus, Here's the picture.

I also connected things with KAS for no apparent reason, Just thought it looked cool

I also made these tiny things called Oxygen Systems, Again no reason just thought it looked cool and realistic!

I think i did great for my first colony that wasen't spreaded out and was actually close to eachother.
